title: VCMI artifact format
description: Format used to define new artifacts in VCMI

warMachine.description: Creature id to use on battle field. If set, this artifact is war machine

type.description: Type of this artifact - creature, hero or commander

slot.description: Slot to which this artifact can be put, if applicable

class.description: Artifact class, treasure, minor, major or relic

value.description: Cost of this artifact, in gold

components.description: Optional, list of components for combinational artifacts

bonuses.description: Bonuses provided by this artifact using bonus system

graphics.description: Graphical files associated with the artifact

image.description: Base image for this artifact, used for example in hero screen

large.description: Large image, used for drag-and-drop and popup messages

event.description: Text that visible on picking this artifact on map

index.description: Private field to break things, do not use.

onlyOnWaterMap.description: It true, artifact won't spawn on a map with water
